affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 表示"...的"

word_mean_info__list.difference: 泛指正患病的人，尤指正接受治疗的人。
多指因伤病或营养不良而造成键康受损，需要他人照顾、护理的病人，也指先天性的残疾者。

word_group.brief_definition: 对...有耐心；有耐心；具有耐心
经常来看病却查不出是何疾病的人；看病癖者
精神病人；精神病；神经病人
手术患者；外科手术病人；外科病人
垂死的病人；临终病人；危重病人
病人检查台；病人检查床；病人信息表

bilingual.source: The doctors are not examining the patient.
bilingual.target: 医生们没有在检查病人。

bilingual.source: She checks on each patient every three hours.
bilingual.target: 她每三小时检查一次每个病人。

bilingual.source: She saves the life of her first patient in Panama.
bilingual.target: 她在巴拿马救了她的第一个病人。

bilingual.source: The patient is in a critical state.
The caring nurse comforted the patient with kind words.
bilingual.target: 那位关心病人的护士用温柔的话语安慰了病人。

bilingual.source: The patient let out groans of pain.
bilingual.target: 病人发出痛苦的呻吟声。

yingyinNormal.en: We change the sheets on these beds after every patient.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每送走一个病人，我们都会更换床单。

yingyinNormal.en: You are my patient.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是我的病人。

yingyinNormal.en: Sometimes to stop the cancer, you have to endanger the patient.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有时要想治愈癌症，危及病人在所难免。

yingyinNormal.en: How they could be during the standing of a patient is not accurate?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是病人忍受的他们又如何能有切身体会呢？

yingyinNormal.en: You are my patient. I would like to help. You can't fix this one buddy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是我的病人，我想帮助你。这个你治不了。

yingyinNormal.en: Half eight. He had to go to another patient. Snow got pretty bad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 八点半了，他得去看下一个病人了，雪下得非常大。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe we should start with that. Now you're being a responsible patient.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许我们应该从那个开始。现在你才是个尽责的病人。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, what if you make an appointment as a patient? Then you'll get to talk to her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你假装自己是病人去预约呢？那你就有机会跟她谈啦。

yingyinNormal.en: Excuse me. Sorry, Stuart. Hey, I'm in a hospital and I'm not the patient. I'm fine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 失陪了。抱歉，斯图尔特。我在医院，但不是病人。我乐着呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you know if 5818 Shore Drive is still standing? It's my patient's house, and she's worried.
yingyinNormal.zh: 滨海大道5818号塌了吗？那是我病人的房子，她很担心。

yingyinNormal.en: Fine. Weird. Patient spent most of the time talking about how she hated being back at the hospital.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很好，奇怪，病人花了大部分时间在说她如何讨厌回到医院。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I see. Can the patient have a visitor? Just for a little while. He might get tired.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢我明白了。那我可以来探望病人吗？只能看一会儿哦。因为他可能会很累。

yingyinNormal.en: Could a doctor give you a pill which is actually a sugar pill, or tic-tac if you say it's supposed to be minty, and cure their patient?
yingyinNormal.zh: 医生能不能给病人一颗表面上是药丸，实际上却是糖果安慰剂的东西 (或是薄荷糖，如果你觉得那是薄荷口味的话)，却仍然能治愈病人呢?

yingyinNormal.en: Before the patient was even diagnosed, we deployed one of our new CDC rapid response teams.
yingyinNormal.zh: 即便在病人被确诊之前，我们已经部署了一支我们新的疾控快速反应小组。

yingyinNormal.en: To raise malpractice insurance. To make sure no doctor ever helps a dying patient end his or her life?
yingyinNormal.zh: 来提高医疗事故保险金，来确保医生不会帮助垂死的病人结束生命？

yingyinNormal.en: See, that's what I like about Joey. Any other guy would have been: Yeah, The English Patient is my favorite movie too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就是喜欢乔伊这一点，其他人都会说“我也最喜欢‘英国病人’”。

yingyinNormal.en: Dr. Brown Bear is here, to see if Peppa is better. Ah, good, the nurse is already here. How is the patient?
yingyinNormal.zh: 棕熊医生过来看佩琪有没有好一点。噢很好，护士小姐已经来啦。病人怎么样啦？

yingyinNormal.en: Hi. This is Dr. Grey. I need to book an O.R. for an exploratory laparotomy. Surgeon is Bailey. Patient is Webber.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好，我是格蕾医生，我想预订手术室做腹腔探查。手术由Bailey做，病人是Webber。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig has come to find George. Oh, no! What's wrong with George? Don't worry, Daddy. It's only a game. George is our patient.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸过来找乔治啦。噢糟糕，乔治他是怎么了。别担心爸爸，玩游戏而已。乔治是我们的病人。

yingyinNormal.en: I know this is difficult, but Brooks is our patient. I'm telling you this to remind you to be her doctor, not her friend right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道这很困难，但是Brooks是病人。我说这些是想提醒你，你是她的医生，不是她的朋友。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 忍耐；容忍；耐心；耐性；单人纸牌戏

word_family.mean: adj. 有耐心的；忍耐的；容忍的

examination_example.sentence: There are lessons about informed <highlight>patient</highlight> consent to learn.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于知情患者同意，有一些教训值得学习。

examination_example.sentence: It is not enough to say that the algorithms DeepMind develops will benefit <highlight>patients</highlight> and save lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 仅仅说DeepMind开发的算法将造福患者、挽救生命是不够的。

examination_example.sentence: The chief executive of Myriad, a company in Utah, said the ruling was a blessing to firms and <highlight>patients</highlight> alike.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 犹他州一家公司Myriad的首席执行官表示，这一裁决对公司和患者来说都是一件好事。

examination_example.sentence: Still, while every parent would like to be <highlight>patient</highlight>, this is no easy task.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管每个父母都想保持耐心，但这并不是一件容易的事情。

examination_example.sentence: Children of every age benefit from <highlight>patient</highlight> parenting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个年龄段的孩子都受益于耐心的养育。

examination_example.sentence: Fortunately, there's another sort of parent that's a bit easier to describe: a <highlight>patient</highlight> parent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 幸运的是，还有另一种更容易描述的父母：耐心的父母。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 表示"...的"

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 忍耐；容忍；耐心；耐性；单人纸牌戏

word_family.mean: adj. 有耐心的；忍耐的；容忍的

examination_example.sentence: It likes to engage in everyday conversations with <highlight>patients</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它喜欢和病人进行日常对话。

examination_example.sentence: They perform routine and laborious tasks, freeing nurses up to attend to <highlight>patients</highlight> with immediate needs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们执行常规而繁重的任务，让护士有时间去照顾有迫切需要的病人。

examination_example.sentence: Prescription of antibiotics can be harmful to <highlight>patients</highlight>' health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 开抗生素处方可能对病人的健康有害。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 表示"...的"

word_usage.usage:
“对某人有信心”是be patient with sb，其介词with不能换成to。如：
你必须对他有耐心。
误 You must be patient to him.
正 You must be patient with him.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 忍耐；容忍；耐心；耐性；单人纸牌戏

word_family.mean: adj. 有耐心的；忍耐的；容忍的

examination_example.sentence: Removing objects from <highlight>patients</highlight>' noses and ears.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 移除病人鼻子和耳朵上的东西。

examination_example.sentence: Alzheimer's <highlight>patients</highlight> tend to watch television more than 3 hours a day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿尔茨海默病患者每天看电视的时间往往超过 3 小时。

examination_example.sentence: In fall 2010, she helped launch a pilot project in Chicago to see if the iPad could improve working conditions and <highlight>patient</highlight> care.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2010年秋天，她帮助在芝加哥启动了一个试点项目，确认iPad能否改善工作条件和病人护理。

word_usage.usage:
“对某人有信心”是be patient with sb，其介词with不能换成to。如：

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 忍耐；容忍；耐心；耐性；单人纸牌戏

word_family.mean: adj. 有耐心的；忍耐的；容忍的

examination_example.sentence: We had a woman <highlight>patient</highlight> who was recovering from a knee replacement operation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们有一位女性病人，她刚做完膝关节置换手术，正在康复中。

examination_example.sentence: Hospital <highlight>patients</highlight> who see tree branches out their window are likely to recover at a faster rate than <highlight>patients</highlight> who see buildings instead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在医院里，看到窗外树枝的病人比看到建筑物的病人恢复得更快。

examination_example.sentence: In these places <highlight>patients</highlight> can go to be near nature during their recovery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这些地方，病人可以在康复期间亲近大自然。

examination_example.sentence: We seek people who are <highlight>patient</highlight> and caring, and who have  experience and interest in working with older adults.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们寻找有耐心、有爱心、有经验并有兴趣与老年人一起工作的人。

examination_example.sentence: Be a little <highlight>patient</highlight>, Jack.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 杰克，要有一点耐心。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 忍耐；容忍；耐心；耐性；单人纸牌戏

word_family.mean: adj. 有耐心的；忍耐的；容忍的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 对...有耐心；有耐心；具有耐心

examination_example.sentence: Nurses sometimes talk with <highlight>patients</highlight> and their family members to make them feel better.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 护士有时会与患者及其家属交谈，让他们感觉好些。

examination_example.sentence: It improves relations between doctors and <highlight>patients</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它改善了医患关系。

examination_example.sentence: The doctor told the <highlight>patient</highlight> to take the medicine (s) three times a day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医生告诉病人每天服药三次。

examination_example.sentence: She is more <highlight>patient</highlight> than her brother.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她比她哥哥更有耐心。

examination_example.sentence: Always keep in mind: be polite and <highlight>patient</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 永远记住：要有礼貌和耐心。

examination_example.sentence: Work hard and be <highlight>patient</highlight>, or your dream won't come true.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要努力工作且有耐心，否则你的梦想不会实现。

word_usage.usage:
“对某人有信心”是be patient with sb，其介词with不能换成to。如：
你必须对他有耐心。
误 You must be patient to him.
正 You must be patient with him.
